An apparently simple game with lots of puzzles that eventually groves harder. But you are not alone, you have a psychotic computer as a companion. What else is needed?
A Nice Puzzle Game with a interesting but simple story.

What? You have never played Portal and you call yourself a gamer? Pffffffffffff... In all seriousness though, this title needs no introduction. An absolute masterpiece. Yes it's a bit short, and a little bit old, but who cares when it's this good? If you are skimming through the comment section and wondering "is this game even worth playing?". I am gonna stop you right there. YES. GET THE GAME. DO IT NOW.

-Story & Content 9/10
